title: The opinion of the Roman jvdges touching imprisonment and the liberty of the subject, or, A sermon preached at the Abby at Westminster, at a late publique fast, Jan. 25, 1642 by J.V. Prisoner.
author: Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652.
notes: Attributed to John Vicars by Halkett and Laing and Wing.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
